item.title: Google Maps without any labels/country names
item.description: I wanted to get a blank version of Google Maps without any of the country names on for a visualisation I’m working on but I’d been led to believe that this wasn’t actually possible. In actual fact we do have control over whether the labels are shownvia the ‘styles’ optionwhich we can call on the map.
